fields.name: WHO WON?:
fields.value: Pick two targets. Simulate an attack from both targets on the other. Factoring in only their latest evening scores, attack power, and defense power, you will be told if target 1 successfully kills target 2, and the inverse.

fields.name: WHO’S NEXT?:
fields.value: Guess who will visit who tonight, and what the nature of the visit will be (attack, protection, investigation, RB, or miscellaneous if none of those.) You will be informed if you got something right (that being either one of the players or the nature of the visit), but you won’t be told what you got right. You will be told you got nothing right if that’s the case.

fields.name: YOU DECIDE (Passive):
fields.value: Your vote is the tiebreaker, with greater priority than abstains. If another “tiebreaker” is present, better evening score from last evening breaks the tie.
